Title: An Act Converting the Camarines Norte High School in the Municipality of Daet, Province of Camarines Norte, into a National School, to be Known as the Camarines Norte National High School
Data:
BATAS PAMBANSA Blg. 556
An Act Converting the Camarines Norte High School in the Municipality of Daet, Province of Camarines Norte, into a National School, to be Known as the Camarines Norte National High School
Section 1. The Camarines Norte High School in the Municipality of Daet, Province of Camarines Norte, is converted into a national high school, to be known as the Camarines Norte National High School.
Section 2. The amount of one hundred thousand pesos for the operation of the school shall be funded out of the appropriations authorized by Batas Pambansa Blg. 230 for the Ministry of Education, Culture and Sports intended for new high schools and an additional amount corresponding to fifty percent of its share in the budgetary aid actually paid to it before such conversion shall be released for its operation from the national assistance fund to local schools. Thereafter, such sum as may be necessary for its operation and maintenance shall be included in the annual General Appropriations Act.
Section 3. This Act shall take effect upon its approval.
Approved: June 24, 1983
